description.original: Supercharge your canvas experience! Create presentations, flowcharts and more!
description.translation: 增强您的画布体验！创建演示文稿、流程图等！

dict.Notice(\"Reload obsidian to apply the ch: Notice("请重载 Obsidian 以应用更改。")
dict.Notice(\"No start node found. Please mar: Notice("未找到起始节点。请通过弹出菜单将节点标记为起始节点。")
dict.error(\"Expected '\" + c + \"' instead: error("预期字符是 '" + c + "' 而非 '" + ch + "'")
dict..error('Style attribute is missing the \: .error('样式属性缺少 "options" 字段或该字段不是数组')
dict..error('Style attribute is missing a def: .error('样式属性缺少默认选项 (option with a "value" of null)')
dict..error(\"Failed to stringify canvas data: .error("使用 json-stable-stringify 序列化画布数据失败:", e)
.error("使用 JSON.stringify 序列化画布数据失败:", e2)
dict..error(\"Invalid JSON, repairing through: .error("检测到无效JSON，正在通过Advanced Canvas修复:", e)
dict..error(\"Error loading remote css\", e.t: .error("加载远程 CSS 时出错", e.toString()
dict..error(\"Error loading remote stylesheet: .error("加载远程样式表时出错", err)
dict..error(\"Error inlining remote css file\: .error("内联远程 CSS 文件时出错", e)
dict..error(`Error while reading CSS rules fr: .error(`从 ${sheet.href} 读取 CSS 规则时出错`, e)
dict.description: \"General settings of the A: description: "Advanced Canvas 插件通用设置"
dict.description: \"The type of node that wil: description: "在画布上双击时创建的节点类型"
dict.description: \"When enabled, new nodes w: description: "启用后，新节点将自动对齐网格"
dict.description: \"The maximum width of a no: description: "节点的最大宽度（设为-1表示无限制）"
dict.description: \"When enabled, the font si: description: "启用后，缩放时组节点标题和连线标签等字体大小不会增大"
dict.description: \"Make .canvas files compat: description: "使.canvas文件支持反向链接和出向链接功能，并在图谱视图中显示连接"
dict.description: \"When enabled, edges betwe: description: "启用后，文件节点间的连线将被视为链接（例如A.md节点连向B.md节点时，文件A.md的出向链接中会显示B.md）"
dict.description: \"Combine all style attribu: description: "将Advanced Canvas的所有样式属性整合到单个下拉菜单中"
dict.description: \"Style your nodes with dif: description: "为节点设置不同形状和边框样式"
dict.description: \"Add custom style settings: description: "为节点添加自定义样式设置（详见GitHub文档）"
dict.description: \"Style your edges with dif: description: "为连线设置不同路径样式"
dict.description: \"Add custom style settings: description: "为连线添加自定义样式设置（详见GitHub文档）"
dict.description: \"When enabled, the edge st: description: "启用后，拖拽连线时会实时更新连线样式"
dict.description: \"When enabled, the square: description: "启用后，方形路径的拐角将变为圆角"
dict.description: 'When enabled, the arrow wi: description: '当路径查找方法设为"直接"时，启用此选项可使箭头随连线方向旋转'
dict.description: \"When enabled, the A* path: description: "启用后，A*路径算法允许对角线路径"
description: "启用后，A*路径将显示为圆滑曲线"
dict.description: `Change the zoom breakpoint: description: `通过${VARIABLE_BREAKPOINT_CSS_VAR} CSS变量，按节点设置内容停止渲染的缩放临界值`
dict.description: \"Change the z-index of nod: description: "通过右键菜单调整节点的z轴层级"
dict.description: \"When enabled, you can mov: description: "启用后，可逐层调整节点前后位置"
dict.description: \"When enabled, the canvas: description: "启用后，克隆节点时会自动缩放至该节点"
dict.description: \"The margin between the cl: description: "克隆节点与源节点之间的间距"
dict.description: \"The step size for expandi: description: "节点扩展时的步进尺寸"
dict.description: \"Create edges that are aut: description: "通过将连线拖至目标节点区域（无需对准连接点）自动创建到合适侧的连线"
dict.description: 'When enabled, the \"from\": description: '启用后，连线的起点端将始终浮动'
dict.description: \"Flip the direction of edg: description: "通过弹出菜单翻转连线方向"
dict.description: \"When enabled, the backgro: description: "启用后，只读模式下将隐藏背景网格"
dict.description: \"Automatically resize the: description: "根据内容自动调整节点高度"
dict.description: \"When enabled, the auto re: description: "启用后，所有节点默认开启自动调整高度"
dict.description: \"The maximum height of the: description: "自动调整时的节点最大高度（-1表示无限制）"
dict.description: \"When enabled, the height: description: "启用后，节点高度将对齐网格"
dict.description: \"Group nodes can be collap: description: "可折叠/展开组节点以保持画布整洁"
dict.description: \"When enabled, a group tha: description: "启用后，拖拽节点时折叠的组节点会显示边框"
dict.description: \"Focus on a single node an: description: "聚焦单个节点并模糊其他节点"
dict.description: \"Create a presentation fro: description: "将画布转换为演示文稿"
dict.description: \"If turned off, you can st: description: "关闭后仍可通过命令设置起始节点"
dict.description: \"The default ratio of the: description: "幻灯片默认比例（例如16:9对应1200x675，3:2对应1350x900）"
dict.description: \"The padding of the slide: description: "将画布包裹为幻灯片时的内边距"
dict.description: \"When enabled, the viewpor: description: "启用后，演示结束后视口会重置到原始位置"
dict.description: \"When enabled, you can use: description: "启用后，可使用方向键切换幻灯片"
description: "启用后，可使用PgUp/PgDown切换幻灯片（兼容多数演示遥控器）"
dict.description: \"When enabled, the canvas: description: "启用后，缩放幻灯片时将忽略内边距"
dict.description: \"When enabled, the zoom wi: description: "启用后，演示时缩放比例不受限制"
dict.description: \"The duration of the slide: description: "幻灯片切换动画时长（秒），设为0禁用动画"
dict.description: \"The intensity of the slid: description: "幻灯片切换动画强度（值越大切换时缩放幅度越大）"
dict.description: \"Encapsulate a selection o: description: "通过右键菜单将选中的节点和连线封装为新画布"
dict.description: \"Create portals to other c: description: "创建通往其他画布的传送门"
dict.description: \"When enabled, edges into: description: "启用后，显示指向禁用传送门的连线"
dict..setDesc(\"Higher pixel ratios result in: .setDesc("更高的像素比率会生成更高分辨率的图像，但也会增加文件大小。")
dict..setDesc(\"This will not include the fon: .setDesc("导出时将不包含字体文件，可减小SVG文件体积。")
dict..setDesc(\"This will add an Obsidian + A: .setDesc("这将在左下角添加Obsidian + Advanced Canvas的徽标。")
dict..setDesc(\"This will obscure any text on: .setDesc("这将模糊处理画布上的所有文本内容。")
dict..setDesc(\"This will make the background: .setDesc("这将使导出的图片背景变为透明。")
